article: I'm Ann. I'm English. I'm twelve. I was born on May 17 th , 1991. I learn Chinese at Beijing No.3 Middle School. I have a good friend. Her name is Lucy. She is twelve, too. We are in the same grade. But we are not in the same class. I'm in Class Two, and she is in Class Three. We have the same Chinese teacher. Her name is Zhang Ying. We all like her. Lucy's parents are English teachers in China. She has a sister. Her name is Lily. She is only five years old.
questions: Lily's parents are in _ . They teach English.
Lucy and _ are in the same grade.
